name: Belak the Outcast

action.name: Quarterstaff
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit (+4 to hit with shillelagh), reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage with shillelagh or if wielded with two hands.

trait.name: Spellcasting
text: The druid is a 4th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following druid spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): druidcraft, poison spray, shillelagh
• 1st level (4 slots): cure wounds, entangle, faerie fire, thunderwave

spells: druidcraft, poison spray, shillelagh, cure wounds, entangle, faerie fire, thunderwave, barkskin, flaming sphere
description: Source: Tales from the Yawning Portal p. 9
